thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Alstria Office REIT Announces Capital Increase Of Up To 15.3 Mln New Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alstria Office REIT Announces Capital Increase Of Up To 15.3 Mln New Shares
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - ALSTRIA OFFICE REIT AG:
* DGAP-ADHOC: ALSTRIA OFFICE REIT-AG: CAPITAL INCREASE OF UP TO 15,323,121 NEW SHARES TO FINANCE FURTHER GROWTH
* ‍PROCEEDS TO BE PARTIALLY USED TO FUND C. EUR 87.4 M ACQUISITIONS​
* ‍CONFIRMS THAT IT WILL BE MEETING ITS GUIDANCE FOR FY2017​
* ‍PORTFOLIO VALUATION GAIN 2017 EXPECTED TO AMOUNT TO C. EUR 180 M​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
